title: Google\Cloud\GkeBackup\V1\UpdateBackupPlanRequest
name: UpdateBackupPlanRequest
description:
Request message for UpdateBackupPlan.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.gkebackup.v1.UpdateBackupPlanRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.backup_plan
params.description: Required. A new version of the BackupPlan resource that contains updated fields. This may be sparsely populated if an update_mask is provided.

params.name: data.update_mask
params.description: This is used to specify the fields to be overwritten in the BackupPlan targeted for update. The values for each of these updated fields will be taken from the backup_plan provided with this request. Field names are relative to the root of the resource (e.g., description, backup_config.include_volume_data, etc.) If no update_mask is provided, all fields in backup_plan will be written to the target BackupPlan resource. Note that OUTPUT_ONLY and IMMUTABLE fields in backup_plan are ignored and are not used to update the target BackupPlan.
